name: Curve25519.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
desc: A Curve25519 private key used for key agreement.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a random Curve25519 private key for key agreement.

items.name: init<D>(rawRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a Curve25519 private key for key agreement from a collection of bytes.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: The raw representation of the key as a collection of contiguous bytes.

items.name: func sharedSecretFromKeyAgreement(with: Curve25519.KeyAgreement.PublicKey) -> SharedSecret
items.desc: Computes a shared secret with the provided public key from another party.

items.name: struct SharedSecret
items.desc: A key agreement result from which you can derive a symmetric cryptographic key.
